alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Outflow from thunderstorms will impact portions of western Otero, El Paso, Crowley and Pueblo Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary associated with thunderstorms along a line extending from Ramah to near Hanover to near Avondale to 13 miles southeast of Blende. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Stronger wind gusts may be possible as the outflow boundary shift southeast. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Fountain, Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Calhan, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Boone, Sugar City, Crowley, Ramah, Hanover, Truckton, Yoder, Peyton, Pinon, Blende, Avondale and Rush. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
